website_summaries.verdict: Extremely portable and lightweight for spot cleaning and upholstery.
pros: At only nine pounds, this cleaner is easy to take where you need it
Users love the self-cleaning hose that flushes away dirt and bacteria after each use
The powerful multipurpose tool is made with antimicrobial materials to keep it clean
cons: Not meant for cleaning the carpet of an entire room at one time

website_summaries.verdict: Offers powerful cleaning power in a compact design.
pros: Owners give this model top praise for its powerful cleaning ability as well as portable, intuitive design
We love that it's not only easy to use but also that the head is easy to remove and clean
cons: Some reports of hose and sprayer malfunctioning

customer_reviews.title: A Pic is Worth a Thousand Words.....
customer_reviews.text: This a great little machine that packs a punch. Our dog is a digger and loves to rub his dirty face along the front of the den chairs. I have paid lots $$$ for professionals to come and spot clean them. For the cost of less than one cleaning I bought the Hoover and just look at the pictures. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Ann Z. Parks

customer_reviews.title: We bought this machine because after many years of use our Bissell spot bot started to leak and this looked perfect to try especially with the hose cleaning option
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS!!! We bought this machine because after many years of use our Bissell spot bot started to leak and this looked perfect to try especially with the hose cleaning option. The hose cleaning option is a joke and the advertising is misleading. We have used this maybe 5 times for our new puppies potty training accidents. I bought a UV lightto see if it cleaned up the accidents and it did completely but the stench of mildew is so bad it has to be moved tothe garage to be stored. This is all after thoroughly cleaning the machine, hoses included. I'm trying to return it as I write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy D

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptable Product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived full of mildew. You could feel the dampness on the box and smell it. Pretty disgusting that nobody caught this before it went out. Why would they water test the unit and then repackage it wet. There was still water in the tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Warning, Warning
customer_reviews.text: I placed the water/solutions container in the unit and it leaked like a sieve. There is a missing component on the unit that prevents the leaking. Despite numerous complaints on this review blog, quality assurance hasn't fixed this problem. Customer service at Hoover said to call a service center, and Amazon doesn't give refunds. So disgusted I am throwing this unit in the dumpster. Beware of no refund policy!
customer_reviews.author: Ted C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't spray! And no refund, either!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this item. I unpacked it, read the instructions, assembled it,and read the instructions again. I filled the tank, plugged it in and turned it on. The motor ran, and had good suction, but it didn't spray fluid. I tried again, no change. I turned it off, read the instructions again, and tried all of the troubleshooting tips. NOPE. I called Amazon support. The young lady on the phone was very helpful. At first she authorized paying for a repair, but since the closest authorized repair center is four hours away, that wasn't feasible. Thankfully I got a refund. EDIT: NOPE! Didn't get a refund! The lady on the phone LIED to me.
customer_reviews.author: CreepingJennie

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Spotless two weeks ago. I have used it twice and both times the clean water tank has leaked...badly. The only advice or recommendation is "make sure it's in place correctly ". It just snaps into the machine...not sure how I could mess that up. It does clean very well though, I just have to go around sucking up the water from all of the leaking. I just it used it for the third time, used a bowl to catch leaks (real hard to use with a bowl under it) and measured to water that leaked 2 cups!!! (Some was on the counter too!) Grrr... and of course no customer service today (Sunday).
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS.
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this less than one year ago, and used it 3 times. When I tried to use it today, it would not spray water. the manual says if this happens there is air in the hose, and you are to press the wand against the floor and pull the trigger for 60 seconds. I tried that 3 times. it did not help. I tried to call the help line, but after being on hold for 20 minutes, I hung up. This piece of $%*!! is going in the garbage as that's exactly what it is -- a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great; Low Durability!
customer_reviews.text: The angle for where the hose contacts the unit in the back when storing the unit is far too extreme. This puts undue pressure on the walls of the hose when it is being stored which results in micro-damage to the hose. We are house breaking a new Malamute puppy and our steam cleaner got a lot of exercise. The hose sheared in half after about three months of use. I have contacted Hoover and they are sending me a replacement. The product cleans very well; however, long term (2-3 year) durability is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Book_Guru

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed to start leaking within one year
customer_reviews.text: Had this about a year, use dit less than 12 - 15 times, and now the solution container leaks completely. Leaking where the solution outtake connects to the main unit. Can not see any cracks or cause, but it leaks dry. Others have complained about these units leaking, I should have listened. Tossed in the trash and getting something that lasts over one year. DO NOT TRUST or BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Randall M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Who designed this atrocity to leak everywhere?
customer_reviews.text: Solution tank leaks out the bottom of the unit when installed, and not a little leak, steady stream of water. Hose also leaked the first time I used it. Spent more time cleaning up water from the leak than I did the carpet. I returned it and bought the Bissell Little Green Proheat version. Which is dry as a bone when running and works well. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: kissfan00

customer_reviews.title: Suction hose tore and lost suction after about 2 years of light use
customer_reviews.text: This machine worked well until the suction hose ripped open and, of course, suction was lost where it mattered, at the working end. I repaired the torn hose with "Silicone Rescue Tape" (bought at my local hardware store; same as  It looks like the Spot Cleaner will work again, but the tear being where the hose bends so it can be stowed neatly, I will just put it away with the hose loose so as not to strain the torn spot. Looks like the material the hose is made of is not flexible enough. This cleaner has been stored in a closet at room temperature and humidity and lightly used.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but, NOT very durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little unit while it lasted. Almost one year to the day that I purchased it the hose has torn at the point that it enters the vacuum housing. No way to repair this... Not sure that I could recommend this as far as durability is concerned. Only as good as long as it lasts. Not even a replaceable item. I would expect more out of Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: JDFras

customer_reviews.title: HOOVER BEATS BISSELL
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cleaner after tossing by Bissell cleaner off a bridge. Has a long cord and NO recharge battery that can't be replaced (as in Bissell), the cleaning wand has durable rubber brush that does a good job loosening the dirt, the suction is strong and the unit is easy to clean. Especially like the reverse flow that cleans the hose after use (dog and cat owners will appreciate this.) Just delivered and used once, we'll see how it goes long term.
customer_reviews.author: Valyent

customer_reviews.title: POOR construction, GOOD design, WORST Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the unit - my old one lasted nearly a year with heavy use - but this one has been used THREE TIMES and is leaking at the hose handle already. Hoover is HORRID to work with... just keep it in mind. Maybe try Bissell. I am. UPDATE - I have my SECOND one of these but will never buy a third. It leaks from the tool connection - has since I got it. Going to use it wrapped with a towel until it dies then get another brand. Hoover does not back up their products
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: I AM NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: Had one sick puppy (literally) yesterday...also had a still-in-the-box, received-just-eight-days-ago, Hoover Spotless Portable Carpet Cleaner. A match made in heaven? If only. Took only a couple of minutes to set up. Instructions were in some other version of English than the one I learned, but it's a simple machine and went together quickly. Unfortunately, that was it for good news. Tried for over an hour and it never sprayed out the cleaning solution. Troubleshooting guide was a joke and after 18 minutes of agonizing hold music I gave up on Customer Service. I hope to be at Kohl's tomorrow returning the sorry thing. I've had several other Hoover products and loved them but I'll think several times before buying another.
customer_reviews.author: asaskid

customer_reviews.title: It CAME BROKEN manufacture didn’t care.
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for this product and after finally receiving it, it came COMPLETELY Broken! Leaking water as soon as we added it to the vacuum. I did the biggest MISTAKE calling the company that manufactures the product. They asked for several things: my first-last name, telephone number, address, model #, MFG Code, and the amazon receipt (screen shots of date of purchase and item description) The the worker then mentioned she would email us a warranty !?!?!?!? THEN respond IN 3-5 BUSINESS DAYS!??!?!?!?!? I literally called AMAZON because that’s where I purchased it and they’re sending me a NEW One because the manufacturer is legit CRAP. Don’t purchase from these people if you have a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: If you have kids....this is MUST!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this after reading the reviews. I can’t tell you how happy I am with this purchase. It’s lightweight and suctions perfectly. In one day I cleaned a mattress, chair, various floor stains and even sucked up all the dirt and stains in my CAR! If you have young kids who spill food and drinks everywhere this is a must have. It’s the absolute best item I’ve purchased to date and I wish I’d invested in it years ago. Even cleaned the cushions on the couch and they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I expected to be better
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. But it does not clean as well as it said it would. THIS IS NOT A STEAM CLEANER!... I used it to clean my dining Room chairs, And they were fairly wet after I cleaned them. So the suction it's not as bad but I thought it would be better from the reviews I read. I am extremely disappointed, I thought this would be a good solution. I would also like to mention that I did use the shampoo that was provided, And I also tried another brand to see it worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Arenas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pets accident
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE~ OF COURSE, after it’s too late to return, it leaks! 😞 I only used is a handful of times, but the last time, my daughter cleaned a stain from her mattress (worked well) but she came and told me it was leaking! I can’t figure out from where, but it’s the dirty water! I’m so bummed because this worked great! And it’s not cheap! ...........I absolutely love this product! Let me start by saying, the first one I received was broke! Customer service was great and i had a new one in 2 days! I love how the containers are small, so not too heavy when filling and enptying! There is also a hose cleaning port!
customer_reviews.author: crazybeautiful81

customer_reviews.title: NOT for CARPET & UPHOLSTERY for carpet
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description (carpet and upholstery spot cleaner), I purchased this thing specifically to use on upholstered furniture. Not only is it not designed to use on upholstery (that would be it's 'blue' sister model as it turns out). There is no upholstery attachment. Now, I can't return it and am out $86. Not happy. Amazon, correct the product description and/or honor returns when they are inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Heart

customer_reviews.title: EPIC FAIL!  DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: We just used this product for the 1st time and hose leaked everywhere. I am unable to return product. I will never purchase a Hoover product again or any related Hoover products. FYI I spent years of my adult life in the cleaning business and my husband has an engineering degree if anyone plans blaming the operator. I just wanted something simple to clean my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: TooFar

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is easy to use and does a nice job. The suction power is good. But unlike a similar upright product, the deep cleaning is not accomplished by rotating brushes or other automated means. Instead, you spray an amount of detergent and then manually scrub with the rubber brush built into the unit. I have found it much easier to spray and the use a handheld nylon scrub brush to clean. Then follow up my using the suction built into the device. It is nice to do stairs and car floors and furnitures, which a regular upright cleaner can not handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazed with this cleaner. I'd rented a store cleaner and did my rugs when we first moved into our new apartment.. Then we got a new puppy. Puppy loves going on the rugs. So rolled up the rug for better days. She's now potty trained so we needed to clean the rug. Bought this for this purpose. I'm absolutely amazed at how clean the rugs came out. Cleaner then the industrial rental. Photo of the rug closest to my feet is the dirty side. See how white it got. The other side?? Every container of dirty water was black! So happy and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Hoover design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Hoover Portable Spot Cleaner and it does clean and suck up the water fairly well. However, when I went to empty the dirty water tank it leaked everywhere. It appears that when the dirty water tank is full it leaks from the bottom no matter how carefully I try to remove the tank. In order not to spill the tank water you can only allow the tank to be less than half full. I've had other portable Hoover spot cleaners before and did not have this problem so this appears to be a design flaw. I can't speak to other ratings since I only used this steamer once.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up--this is NOT returnable through Amazon! They will direct you to the Hoover website, but since this is not purchased through their website, they will not take it back, either. Buyer Beware. To review the item--it is difficult and awkward to use. The nozzle is flimsy, and the clear plastic piece pops off when using. You have to use quite a bit of force, pushing down and pulling back, to suck up any of the water. NOT recommended, which is why I wanted to return it--only to find out it is not returnable for any reason. I am now stuck with a $90 machine that will never be used again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Trouy

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: This was alright for the job, but I used it maybe 3 times and the wand no longer squirts the water out. Makes the product worthless to me. I am over the time of return by 6 months, so it’s Garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Thesun121

customer_reviews.title: A year old and stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the spotless for a year today. .Have only used it maybe 3 times during this period. Took it out 2 days ago and tried to use it and it will not spray. Nothing will come out of the sprayer nozzle at all. Tried the troubleshooting guides from the owners manual and it still will not spray. Finally was able to contact Hoover today and had to email a copy of my receipt showing purchased from Amazon. They should reply within two business days. This product has a 2 year warranty so I can't see a problem but you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: All good besides left behind water.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to use; good suction; wide range for cleaning spray; the cleaning head can take apart for cleaning; love the self hose cleaning, I put more water but use as directed, stop every 10 second, the result is good, it flush out the hair and dirt in the hose, but small amount of water leaks out each time the hose cleaning stops. Cons: after cleaning or discard dirty water, make sure the plastic ring is place back probably or water leaks on your next use; have to lift the machine to make sure water in the hose is all drain out; the clean water tank only has a small opening, takes a long time to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Li

customer_reviews.title: Messy, unintuitive dispenser
customer_reviews.text: What a mess. The trigger that dispenses the solution releases about a 15 second, unstoppable stream of solution. And if you press the trigger again during this time, well, it resets the clock. The user manual says nothing about this “feature”. Why not have the system dispense only when I’m holding the trigger down? Would be way more intuitive and easier to use. I wish I hadn’t wasted my money and instead used the money to get my couches cleaned professionally. I own another Hoover upright and it works well. The trigger on that unit only dispenses when I hold the button.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Rando

customer_reviews.title: On/off switch burnt out
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner works very well. We just rescued a puppy and had a lot of little accidents. This shop vac works well on hard wood floors, carpets,rugs and furniture. It’s easy to carry around the house and the self cleaning mode is awesome. After about a month using it, The machine stopped working. We had to take it in to a shop that specialises on fixing vacuums. They said Brussel products are Notorious for the switches to burn out. The nice thing is it didn’t cost much to fix it And they put a completely different type a switch in it so I shouldn’t have a problem anymore.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I’m satisfied with this Hoover. It’s a small job machine.
customer_reviews.text: Not for people who can’t get down to the floor with the machine. Remember that whatever goes into the machine has to go down whatever drain (Kitchen? Bathroom? Utility Sink?) you use to dump the tank. Dumping the tank is definitely going to get liquid on your fingers. They wash right off with soap and water, but it’s something to think about when your mess is a pet’s urine mistake. (Rubber gloves? Good option) machine is well-thought-out. Fairly light and easy to set up and use. The cleaning cycle uses up the remaining cleaning solution left in the machine and gives me peace-of-mine that the hose isn’t stinky when I put the machine away.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Harrod

customer_reviews.title: No spray...no help from company!
customer_reviews.text: Sprayer does not work. Troubleshoot several times. Company leaves you on hold, no help. Amazon won’t refund!!!! After using a spray bottle to spray carpet then machine to suck it up I realized I should have bought a nice mini wet/dry vac for half the price and the carpet cleaner a spray bottle and a brush. Slot cheaper and probably work better then this junk! ***after a few more tries reached a human who says they will replace. Hopefully!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Solution tank 'broke' after 4 uses . ( update.. i am forced to pay to return part :p )
customer_reviews.text: So there's a 'mechanism; on the solution tank that stops the water from flowing out when you initially flip the tank over after you fill it . There's a little White Piece.. a black grommet .. and a spring . The water pushes on it to stop the water from coming out.. until you put it in the device. After about 4 uses that thing fell out of the solution tank.. so NOW when i flip it over ALL the water comes gushing out before i can put the thing in the unit. Kinda makes it useless :p .
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. Such a dispointment!! I used this product one time, after 20 min it stopped working. The motor was making a really quiet humming noise. It sounded like it was flooded. Unfortunately I wasn't able to return this product and Amazon wanted me to call the manufacture. Frankly I didn't want to spend 30 min on hold. I choose to eat what I paid for it, and start looking for a new product. I will never buy a Hoover again after this experience, or anything that isn't directly from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Keya Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 3rd use
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for the first two uses. Got it out after 9 months in storage for a 3rd use and it leaks all over the place. Leak appears to be inside the unit body somewhere. Starts leaking the moment I attach I solution tank. Tried using it despite leak, but it won't suck anything up into the reclamation tank, either. Waste of money. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Gable

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using this the water wouldn't dispense i was very disappointed but the suction seemed to be working well so I used a spray bottle to distribute the water, the tool got most of the dog hair out of my vans carpet and all the little dirt and food stains from my children and about halfway through cleaning my van the water started dispensing in not sure why it didn't work at first and I'm not sure why it started working but once it did I am happy with the purchase, however am still not giving a great rating because of it not working properly when I first started to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Ault

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: I have 13 yrs old daschund and he sometimes misses his potty pads. My upright didn't do the job that this Hoover does. It took out stains I couldn't get out with upright. It's easy to carry around and really easy to keep it clean without having to worry about gunk and dirt in the hose and under the brushes. And if your a senior it's much easier to use and carry. Good job Hoover!!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Dugan

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE 280 POUNDS OF DOG. GERMAN SHEPARD, BERNESE MOUNTAIN DOG & A GOLDEN RETRIEVER. IT IS UNIMAGINABLE THE DIFFERENT WAYS THEY CAN STAIN A CARPET. THEY HAVEN'T YET CAUSED A STAIN THAT I COULDN'T REMOVE FROM THE CARPET WITH THIS WONDERFUL LITTLE MACHINE. THEY ARE HOUSE DOGS AND TRAVEL IN OUR 42' RV. THE HOOVER IS EXTREMELY LIGHTWEIGHT AND SMALL ENOUGH TO TRAVEL WITH US. ALTHOUGH IT IS LISTED AS A "SPOT REMOVER", I'VE USED IT TO CLEAN THE THE BEDROOM AND DINING ROOM CARPET - IT DOES A GREAT JOB, JUST TAKES SOME TIME FOR THE LARGE AREAS.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Guy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Off-white love seats needed cleaning again. Spots and overall dingy. This machine was cheaper than another professional service so rolled the dice. Wow, great results. It takes a little practice to not be messy, but once you get the hang of it the dirt in the residue tank shows how effective this is. In 30 minutes your couch will look like new. Very clever engineering as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JimB

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet spots
customer_reviews.text: I really like most things about this little carpet cleaner. It also works great in the car for cleaning the upholstery and carpet. When cleaning the couch, I wish the hose was a little bit longer but it's still usable. My only complaint is that if you don't get the dirty water tank assembled exactly right, it will leak all over. It is designed to be put together only one way but the insert part is a little flimsy where it seals to the tank so it is possible to get it wrong. The self cleaning hose feature is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Does the job very well
customer_reviews.text: Mainly bought this to clean stairs. Stairs turned out great. This machine removed more dirt than I thought were on the carpet. Machine was easy to use and everything on the instructions were easy to follow. Used on sofa and love seat and proved to be an easy task also. I recommend spraying carpeting or upholstery first and letting it sit a moment to let it lift out and loosen the dirt, then use the machine. It did suck up the grime effectively. Very portable also.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Worked the first time, but not again after that
customer_reviews.text: I used this machine three times. The first time was great. The second time it leaked a little. The third time it spewed dirty solution all over the carpet I was spot cleaning out the bottom of the machine. Not sure what to do about the huge dirty spot on my carpet now from the machine leaking. Probably will have to hire a professional carpet cleaner to fix the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Update...I cleaned an old white sofa that's been in storage for 10 years, it did a fantastic job!...First use, I'm happy with the result. Cleaned dark colour sofa with no issues, except time. Because the unit is smaller than others I've used it takes more time, but the portability makes up for that. The self cleaning hose aspect is AWESOME! In the past, the stinky residue that you could never quite get rid of... SOLVED!
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Convenient yet time consuming
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, cleans like it’s suppose to, and it’s easy to use. I do however have a few complaints. The first thing I noticed was how easy it was to break off the prongs that the electric cords goes around. It broke taking it out of the box. The second thing is my lever sticks every time I spray water. I have to use two hands to get it to stop spraying otherwise it will continue to spray until it’s out of water. The last thing is that it can be time consuming when filling and emptying. The holes are smaller and it’s almost impossible to dry it correctly to prevent mildew from building up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Needs a longer hose.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little unit. Designed for quick, small jobs, you could do a whole room with it but you will be replenishing it often. Nice long power cord, my only complaint is the hose. It could use another 1-2 feet of hose. Because of that you do have to lug it around and adjust it's position quite often. A really nice feature is the hose cleaning port so it washes it's own hose.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Maggio

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: The insides are complicated to clean. The suction power is not good and completely does not deep clean. Suction was lost after the first six months and seriously depleted after the first year. I DEEP clean my couch once every 3-6 months and do not have children. I am a very clean person and yet after having this one year it takes me six tankfuls to clean a two-seat couch until the reservoir runs clear. Total waste of money. Did I mention that it leaks now?
customer_reviews.author: nh1014

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this primarily because I have a large dog that likes to sit with me on the couch and also play in dirt, but holy cow am I amazed! I cleaned the recliner for the first time in a few years, and it was amazing the color difference in just a quick passover test.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this And the full size machine for the better part of a year and i love it. I have a dog that for some reason pees on the carpet at night even though we take her out right before bed. Anyway this machine does the job wonderfully. I don't know how I survived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Norallia

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We recently had a spot bot, which one thing we liked about it was the rotating brush on the bottom where you could set it on a spot, press the button and walk away. You would come back minutes later and the spot was clean. This one does not have that option. However, this has an option which is better and I would prefer over the bottom brush. This one has a feature that allows you to clean out the hose after every use and you do it right from the machine itself, using the hot water from the tank. All in all worth the money and cleans just as good as our old spot bot.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: There are so many products out there for spot cleaning, I felt like I was taking a risk buying this. I have used it four times and I love it! The sprayer is strong to get down into the carpet and the suction is powerful! I know it is working because the water is very dirty and the carpet spot is clean. I have used it for my high-traffic areas and it works! It came with a trial cleaner and I didn't care for it much for pet urine. I used another product for the pet urine. If you are on the fence about which spot cleaner to get, I would recommend this product! 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Debby C.

customer_reviews.title: what a great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to try to save the seats in my car. I have a 3 y/o grand child and my back seat was a wreck! this little machine was easy to use, small enough to fit in the car and still work, with awesome suction. I cleaned the seats one time and they looked like brand new! my windows left open just a crack on a summer night and 12 hours later when I checked the seats they were totally dry!!! I didn't believe it. I even sat on them just to depth test!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it a few times and it has never had a great suction power. Now it doesn’t spray the solution. Absolutely useless and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several Brussel Little Green machines over the past 10/15 years and this thing absolutely SMOKED IT!! Good bye Brissell. Hand down, the best portable cleaner ever owned and it's not even close. Suction Power is unreal, the tiny plastic scrubbers are firm and actually help clean vs. Little Green machine brushes are a JOKE. I used this thing weekly at our house and I'm telling you--maybe the best product I've ever bought off Amazon. DO NOT buy the current Little Green machine on the market, by Bissell. It was the worst portable cleaner I"ve ever owned, cheap, leaked, didn't clean well, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DP JR.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This hoover vacuum is the worst! Literally waste of money and worse part is they aren't letting me return it. How does amazon mark it as an "amazons choice" yet they dont accept returns. Let me elaborate on how bad this thing is.... the water squirts everywhere except the area you actually want it to go, the suction has some plastic scrub mouth that just ruins the upholstry and the cord is incredibly klunky to use. Not pleased and especially not pleased with the return policy. Literally just threw 115 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: erin brodie

customer_reviews.title: Died in under a year!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine with regular use for about 9 months. I used it for small spot cleanup around the house. One day it would just not turn on. After looking into Hoovers "warranty" policy, unless you live in a big city, you wont be able to get warranty service. Go to the warranty section of their website and it takes you to the "privacy policy" page. I purchased this product trusting in the Hoover name and was sorely let down. I would advise avoiding this product altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Starr

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box NOT working!
customer_reviews.text: This product was my first and last Hoover I'll own in my life. Nevermore! It doesn't spray water from the reservoir. At the current state is useless. My first choice was an Italian brand, Delonghi or Vaporetto. Don't trust paid reviews. I am stuck with a lemon and in the hands of a repair shop for a brand, I always disliked. PS: Have your invoice from Amazon handy. They only honor the warranty if you prove you really own it. Bad policy!
customer_reviews.author: Evandro Munhoz

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last September and now it's out of warranty I guess. It leaked the minute I started to use it, pouring the detergent/water all over the floor. I'm not inexperienced with using this kind of equipment. But this is the first Hoover upholstery cleaner I have tried. I tried to go back over the instructions 3-4 times. Wasted a whole day. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Henrietta H. Latham

customer_reviews.title: No best design. Would not recommend See my review
customer_reviews.text: Pro: portable . Cons: Small water tanks Cannot fill reservoir (bad design) Cheap build ( feels like it’s not going to last) Hose feels stiff ( not very flexible) Non heated.
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction and leaked
customer_reviews.text: Used once, very poor suction (about 50% of solution sprayed was returned back to unit) and then the dirty water reservoir leaked out. The cleaner itself did seem to pull up a stain, but the carpet remained extremely wet. Note inside shipping box indicated that it had been water tested, but maybe I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: dnt

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all the things, yet this vacuum just doesn't seem to do what it claims it can do. I'm still doing most of the work, but I'm getting WORSE results than with elbow grease and a normal vacuum. Very much not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: S M K

customer_reviews.title: Part Man/Part Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Wow - where do I start. Of all my Pandemic purchases, this portable steamer is the stand-out surprise winner of the (many) unexpected and at times aspiration-ally random items I now have somehow acquired over the last few months. What can you steam? What CAN’T you steam? You can steam small carpets, medium carpets, 1940s turkish rugs, mid-century furniture, renaissance revival style fabric chair cushions, comfortable couches, baby/toddler car seats, normal sized car seats and a multitude of yet but soon-to-be-discovered items that will soon be steam cleaned. Get a new lease on life to your most cherished items. Catch Me Steamin’ in 2020 and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Epic Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks water through the base - disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: We had the Bissell Spot Bot prior to buying this. The Spot Bot did a better job cleaning the mess but didn't have a way to clean the hose. This machine claims to clean the hose, which is great, but unfortunately water continues to leak out the bottom of the machine all over the floor or counter when not in use. We have tried to figure out why but cannot. Perhaps we got a lemon, but since it only gets used when there is a mess, we didn't notice this issue until 3 months after purchasing. Very frustrating and now unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: Rina Davison

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning, but does leak if left with solution/mess inside.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this 4 stars because I’ve found that it leaks pretty easily. It cleans up great, suction has met my expectations, and it’s easily transported. Downside is if left in a spot for too long, you’re guaranteed to have gross, dirty water left underneath. Keep it empty and you’re golden! UPDATE: After a little over use (and not overly frequent - here and there with a baby and dogs), I’ve got a hole in the hose and it no longer works. Can’t say I recommend for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product worked One and then quit working
customer_reviews.text: This product worked once out of the box, used for cleaning a stain up on the carpet, cleaned it and made sure there was no water inside the unit before storing it away. Upon going to use the unit again it no longer functions, a warranty claim cannot be made despite it being within their "2 year" window. Please save your money, buy Bissell or anything else but this hot garbage that has tarnished the hoover name for me.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghetti Arms

customer_reviews.title: Compact, spot cleaning only
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for pet throw up on a deep shag carpet. It works great and is the perfect size for small areas like stairs, or spot cleaning. It got the stain out but it suction was hard to use on shag carpet. Could have been a little stronger but with a little more pressure it sucked up all the excess water. Perfect cleaning machine to have on hand in case of accidents and it is compact enough to place in small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry around, cleans well and easy to maintain.
customer_reviews.text: I have a regular upright carpet cleaner with a hose and external attachments and I have never used a portable carpet cleaner until this Hoover. While I can't compare the Hoover to other portable units, I can say it does just as good of a job as my large upright's external hose\tools does without the pain of dealing with moving the larger unit around stairs and for when something is spilled. The water\solution container is big enough for the jobs I use it for and this also keeps the weight down. The unit is very easy to clean and fill\empty.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. It didnt get out all of my stains- but with only a silicon brush and sucker- it did what I expected. Not sure it would work for deep cleaning, but for accident clean ups it did fine. I love the hose cleaning function!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Good for auto interior and small spots
customer_reviews.text: I used this thing to clean up my interior in my truck and it’s done super well. I spilled coffee 3 times, and a gallon jug of tea in my floor board through the years and this worked really well to get the stains and smell out. It looks new again. I used it with the carpet cleaner soap. I’d use it for only small spots and tight spaces. Home use I’d go bigger or else you’ll spend a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Effectively cleans carpets but it’s not worth the time
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works very well for cleaning up stains. However, the time it takes to clean it highly outweighs the the value of the product. It absolutely got the stain out of my carpet but It took me at least three hours to clean and dry out all of the compartments and attachments. This is not something I feel like I could use on a daily basis due to the time it takes to clean all the compartments of the unit. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite household machine! We have little kiddos so this is perfect for the occasional spills and messes. Works best when used before the spill is dry. I did not a tiny bit of pink tint to lighter colored carpets as others noted in the review, however, all other colors don’t seem to stain. It is super easy to use and clean and I love the self cleaning feature for the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Beware: open immediately
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box ... not what I expected at all. It looks like it was a return with half the parts missing. I purchased it a while ago but opened it today to use it. Missing parts: front and rear hose clips, sample solution, additional multi tool insert ... ohhh and the multi tool, no upholstery tool or accessories bag . It does have a hose - guess that’s a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Aussie

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have ever made I have two dogs and twin toddlers and I have used this so much for dogs when they are sick on the carpet or babies throwing up or spilling stuff. It’s a life saver and so easy to use. Number one thing I reccomend to new parents
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 year old catahoula who is starting to have an occasional fit of diarrhea at night. It's not often, but when it happens it is everywhere! This is easy to clean and easy to use. It gets my carpet looking good again with no hint of the disaster that was there before.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey473

customer_reviews.title: No longer works
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this thing. After several short uses it no longer sprays cleaner out of the handle. The suction is great but without dispensing cleaner/water it's useless. The self cleaning feature is great and makes it easy to put away. I was unable to receive any help with my faulty machine so I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: MY KIND OF COUCH CLEANER!
customer_reviews.text: With my backyard being half dirt (half mud when it rains) & having three dogs, I needed a a good couch cleaner. I had researched for weeks & finally settled on this one based on reviews. I've used this machine multiple times on my couch to get mud, dirt, etc off & it works every single time! Tip: Don't spray too much of the water soap solution on the couch. A little goes a long way & I ended up soaking my couch the first time! The cord reaches fairly far but I have a big couch so I had to unplug & relocate twice. Simple to put together & pretty straight forward to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Worcester

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after adopting a greyhound. Didn't know what kinds of messes to expect, but wanted to be prepared. Experienced 2 surprises: 1). Greyhounds seldom, if ever, make a mess! and... 2). On the rare occasions there is a mess to clean up, my Hoover Spotless takes on the challenge and gets the job done! No regrets having bought this spot cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Guy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks continuously. Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Solution tank leaks continuously when attached to unit. This happened on first use so cannot be from contaminants. There is no visible sign of seal damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark1955

customer_reviews.title: This leaks from the holding tank
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small for spills and stains and was hoping this would do the trick, but the holding tank for the solution leaked from the first time of use. It works somewhat well, but doesn't have quite the suction power needed to get the solution out of the carpet. Bottom line, if you need something cheap that isn't top quality, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyWitty1

customer_reviews.title: Very good performance for cleaning; but not very effective for cat stains
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use with a very strong suction power. I could be effective for most stains; but not for cat urine stains. The detergent that the came along with it failed to neutralize the smell of cat urine on the carpet. This did not prevent my cat from urinating in the same spot again. However, I will keep it for other carpet and upholstery stain deep cleaning in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chef

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I’m taking 10 seconds out of deep cleaning every soft surface in my home to write this review. Just buy this product. You will find a millions places to use it. I just pulled a mountain of dirt of a seemingly clean tweed sectional. Cleaned my kids stuffed chair in 3 min versus disassembling it and washing drying in the machines. I restored the fluff to the tread patterns in my area rug and am about to deep clean the oldest rug in our house and I’m giddy. Was quoted $500 for pro cleaning the sectional and area rug alone so am thrilled I tried this before writing that check. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Han Z

customer_reviews.title: Extremely light, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite impressed with this little machine. I use it mainly for cleaning up pet accidents, and it does a great job. I especially like the "self-clean" feature. I'm amazed at what's still left inside the hose after use. I've been using this quite frequently due to 2 cats who are 17 yrs old and are slightly confused at times about where their litter box is, and hairballs are always a treat. This cleans up the messes easily, is not difficult to fill or rinse, and is extremely light--so very easy to move around. I only wish I would have gotten this thing sooner!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: USE IT A FEW TIMES BEFORE YOU DECIDE HOW YOU LIKE IT
customer_reviews.text: EASY ON OFF CLEANING WATER BINS. DOESN'T ROLL AROUND, BUT DOESN'T EASILY TIP OVER. THE HANDLE ALLOWS ME TO ATTACH IT TO MY WALKER OF ALL THINGS, AND I CAN STILL EASILY ACCESS ALL NECESSARY POINTS. THE ONLY PROBLEM IS I NEED ABOUT FOUR OF THESE IN ALL THE STRATEGIC DIRT ZONES IN MY HOUSE!
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works, if you do.
customer_reviews.text: The machine itself is not complicated, and is therefore easy to use. However, to get up spots or stains, a lot of elbow grease and bending over is required. Plus, it is a good idea to rinse the newly cleaned area. There tends to be a lot of soap residue because of a natural tendency to use more soap if the spot is hard to clean. It's better than not having one.
customer_reviews.author: violee

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this little carpet cleaner .... especially since it’s not a huge upright vacuum cleaner that’s big and clunky and takes up space. This little cleaner is great for that occasional dog or cat accident. If you want to clean all the carpets in your house... maybe not for you
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve owned this cleaner for a couple years now and I’m definitely convinced that this Hoover is the perfect spot cleaner machine ever. We had a Bissell Spot Cleaner Machine prior and it didn’t last or work as efficient as this Hoover Cleaner. I’m very happy with this purchase and would purchase again. It’s solid and I appreciate that Hoover thought of every little need, that would be wanted in a portable spot cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning up after accidents.
customer_reviews.text: I have a big carpet shampoo machine, but it's too much hassle to drag out for just the small occasional "whoops". After looking at several smaller units, I chose this one because of the feature that flushes the hose. I've used it twice now, and it's so easy!! Does a great job, gets the carpet pretty dry, and is easy to rinse afterward. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jan D.

customer_reviews.title: powerful enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product do I could clean my sofas since I have pets the trend to get a little dirty. My couches are microfiber and I purchased the pet cleaning solution. Overall I must say it does a pretty good job for a small machine. I have not real complaints about it. It pulled a lot of dirty out of the upholstery, more than I thought was there. So far I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is small, but really powerful! It takes out of the carpet all the spills and also the "invisible" but still hard "shadow" dust. The most important - it takes from the carpet almost all the water, which it used for cleaning, so during the night the carpet is totally dry. To clean the square about 2 sqr m it will take about half an hour. All the time you will need to hold the cleaning tube in the hand and sit on the floor (the holder is short). But as I took it only for spills - it is all ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I like this machine and I use it to clean the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this machine and I use it to clean the fabric seats in my cars. This has saved a ton of money on car cleaning. If my kids or dogs make a mess I don't have to wait to go to a shop to get the seats shampooed. I only gave this 4 stars b/c there is only one thing I was not satisfied with and that is the suction. It does not have as much power as I assumed. Right now it is so hot that the seats dry quickly but in the winter I think it might get musty. I will let you know when I try it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Terminello

customer_reviews.title: It works, but the suction is very poor compared to previous little green pro heat
customer_reviews.text: I feel like it doesn't pull up all of the liquid it puts down, unless it puts down very little water when spraying. I can tell though, that the suction is poor compared to my last machine. I cleans, but not as good as the previous one. Best part of it is the self cleaning port.
customer_reviews.author: 78Foxes

customer_reviews.title: Great for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: We used this spot cleaner a billion times after bringing our new puppy home. Removed all new stains and even some of the old. Just don't forget to empty the return tank every few days or it will stink and blow out stinky air when operating.
customer_reviews.author: Katlady

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Leaving a 1 star for now, bought this a few years back didnt need to open it until now. Upon opening it my package was missing the water/solution tank. Now im sure i can go about my buisness without it as the tank that hilds the dirty water is there. So until i actually test its functionality without water/solution tank i woll leave 1 star. I am currently trying to find one, for just ease of use, but hoover website does not show the part on hand. I will continue to look around
customer_reviews.author: ASP LED LIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy...leaks from below trigger. I read a review that it leaked, decided to try it anyway and low and behold I get one that leaks below trigger even when not squeezing or using. Have to call manufacturer, big hassle. Will buy from a brick and mortar store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... carpet cleaning machine I've owned and by far my favorite! So light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the third carpet cleaning machine I've owned and by far my favorite! So light and easy to use. But the very best thing is the ability to really clean the unit itself! The auto hose cleaner is genius and the suction head comes apart for cleaning (which should be standard but isn't on other machines!) Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: MortonMom

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you're sure first.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn't find this to be a very good spot cleaner. I had to take it apart to get the water flowing. Then the scrubby thing felt really flimsy I didn't feel I could really scrub with it. Over all I was not satisfied with this purchase and Amazon would not let me return it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: As much as I would love to leave a review about how this cleans, I was never able to get it to work. I cannot get it to spray the fluid/water thru the nozzle. This seems to be a common problem after reading reviews/comments here and elsewhere online. Jokes on me for not reading before I bought. Amazon will not let me return it and only says its "not eligible for return" and Hoover wants me to buy a replacement part... for a brand new cleaner THAT HAS NEVER BEEN USED. DO NOT BUY THIS POS. Zero stars REALLY needs to be an option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely incredible!!!! Considering that it is competitively priced; you're getting such a bargain! I struggled with this purchase for months. Reading reviews, checking out stores, asking friends and family. This is the product you want/need. Easy to use, sound is not too loud and the sample that comes with it will last a long time! Get this for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Melw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work AT ALL.  You do not get product support without social media.
customer_reviews.text: No water is coming out. There is a tiny amount of suction. Something is not right. I’d like to troubleshoot, but since I don’t Twitter or Facebook, I do not have access to trouble shooting. Don’t buy unless you are a social media influencer. Buy Hoover products in the store, so you have the option to return them if they are inoperative.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A.

customer_reviews.title: Just got and leaking from the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Just got this delivered, and tried to use it, but as soon as i plugged in the water tank with warm water + soap, it just started leaking from the bottom... any idea?
customer_reviews.author: J Kim

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the results so far
customer_reviews.text: So far this little baby has cleaned stains from a rug and a mattress. I am going to try it on the couch next. I am pleased with the results so far! It is easy to use and one of the less expensive spot cleaners I have seen advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Belle

product_meta.title: Hoover FH11300PC Spotless Portable Carpet & Upholstery Spot Cleaner, Red Spotless
product_meta.description:
Color:Red Spotless| Style Name:Spot Cleaner Only

Families know that messes can happen at any time. Thanks to the Hoover Spotless Portable Carpet and Upholstery Cleaner, there's no need to worry about spills, muddy shoes or pet messes anymore. The Hoover Spotless easily lifts and removes stains by combining powerful suction and hygienic deep-cleaning tools with the added power of Hoover Expert detergents. The only spot cleaner with Self-Clean Technology flushes the hose clean after each use to help prevent odors and bacteria growth, providing a spotless clean inside and out. Dirty Water Capacity: 36 Ounces

Includes

Antimicrobial Rubber Nub Tool

Sample Bottle of Cleaning Solution

Sample Bottle of Pretreat Gel.
feature_bullets: Self-clean technology (patent-pending) -Flushes the hose after each use to help remove dirt and bacteria
Antimicrobial multipurpose tool - Protects against bacteria, mold, and mildew forming in the tool
Dual tank technology - Separates clean and dirty water so you can easily fill, empty, and rinse
Lightweight and portable - Reaches and removes stains virtually anywhere from carpet and upholstery to stairs and more
Convenient deep clean - Sprays, scrubs, and removes everyday stains and spills
